intro:
Drive the Limits
Defy Gravity
Conquer Every Track
description:
Stunt Car Extreme Simulator throws you behind the wheel of powerful vehicles and challenges you to conquer extreme tracks filled with steep climbs, dangerous drops, and tricky obstacles. Test your driving skills with realistic physics as you balance your car, control your speed, and perform daring stunts to reach the finish line.

Race against the clock to earn stars and rewards, then use them to unlock and upgrade a variety of vehicles — from rugged off-road trucks to high-performance stunt cars. Each level offers unique environments and increasingly difficult challenges that keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

Choose your preferred control style and master every turn, jump, and climb as you push your limits across wild landscapes and adrenaline-packed courses.

Stunt Car Extreme Simulator is the perfect game for players who love thrilling races, extreme stunts, and the freedom to drive their own way.
